Text: Thanks for this useful post. It is several files joined together. There is minor overlap at the joins, the sound is about 400 msec ahead of the picture (this can be fixed using Avidemux without recoding), and the 16:9 picture displays as 4:3 (this can be fixed with MPEG4 Modifier without recoding).
Use MKVMerge GUI ; set picture to 16/9 and audio negative delay -400ms
